name: Castle Chicken Run
description:
Made for 32bit Game Jam!

I started this project quite a while back, but decided to make at least a little demo with it. Who knows, maybe the full game will come out of it?

  • LMB - Move forward
  • Move mouse to look around
  • Space - Show arrow
  • ESC - Quit the game
  • F12 - Fullscreen
